metadata.Plot: Wealthy thrill-seekers pay huge premiums to have themselves inserted into military adventures, only this time things don't go exactly to plan.
metadata.Writer: Alexandre Coscas, Joe Kelbley, Robert Crombie
metadata.Actors: Christian Slater, Sean Bean, Ving Rhames
